name: STILL - Bill the Gerbil
description:
Bill the Gerbil is back !

After a training with NASA, the Nothing Artificial Intelligence, Bill has been dematerialized by the professor to become a better mouse. 

Stuck in several loops, you will have to learn new skills to leave the virtual universe.

Are you ready to play Bill the Gerbil and escape from the virtual universe ?

In case you can't play properly the intro video in the game, here is the youtube link :
